properties.Title: Erosion Along Xe Champhone River
properties.Descriptio: Located close to a road, this area is being actively eroded by the Xe Champhone River. Local district authorities (DAFO & DONRE; others) have placed sand bags and rip-rap (rock cages) here, which has slowed, but not halted the erosion.

properties.Title: Erosion Along Dong Moung River
properties.Descriptio: Around 200 m  have eroded along the banks of the Dong Moung River, destroying six homes and four barns in the process.  The local villages have attempted to halt erosion here by importing sand and building a dike.

properties.Title: Erosion at Sakhounua Village
properties.Descriptio: Erosion near Sakhounua Village has eroded 200 m of river bank here (parallel to direction of flow). Each year the river erodes 7-10 m towards the village. Due to the this threat, the village had to relocate four homes and three rice storage facilities.
